name: Distant Places (aerica)
description:
A game about going for a walk, discovering distant places, and enjoying the journey back home.

I was very happy to be in a team again, this time for my first game jam!  I very much enjoy collaborating with such talented people.  Talents as varied as the places you will discover in this game!  :)

Made for Global Game Jam 2019.

(theme: "what home means to you.")
